name: Martian Summer League
description:
Martian Summer League Game

The first humans have arrived in Mars and are ready for the Martian Premier League. But, they need to wait until everyone gets there. In the meantime, the people there decided to create a small tournment to get to know each other, and evolve, they hired you to manage one of the teams, are you up to the challenge?

How to play:

This is a Football Simulation Game, Where you play as a manager of a Martian Team.

Since it is a small tourment with the purpose of meeting, every season you have to "draft" (select) the players that  you want in your team (just like in the NBA/NFL)

You play with your mouse.

Dev notes:

This game is an unfinished (or not) version of my entry to the Gamedev.js Jam.

Because of that, the graphics sucks. So I added this notes in order to help you.

Draft:
  • You need to click in a player card to see more about the player.
  • You can Draft(Select) or click Scout to see more about the player.
  • Every Season, your players will leave your team.
  • You can draft your players again, or select other players.
  • DO NOT DRAFT Harry Maguire - he sucks, just like in real life.
